fields.description: Challenge yourself to a technology detox and refrain from using any screens, including phones, laptops, and computers, for an entire day.
fields.tips:
* Make a list of the tasks you need to complete during the day, and think about alternative ways to accomplish them without using technology.
* Spend time with friends and family to keep yourself occupied or practice mindfulness or meditate.
* Give your phone/laptop/pc to your trusted friends/family/partner or store them in a locker.
* [Educate yourself](https://amzn.to/3LgUzv4) about the side effects of using phone/laptop/pc excessively.

fields.description: Take the first step towards creating a sustainable and eco-friendly environment by planting a beautiful and thriving shrub, herb, or tree.
fields.tips:
* Either choose something that you already like or something from this [selection](https://amzn.to/3mIBuaH).
* Select a spot with enough space for the plant to grow, and make sure it gets adequate sunlight. If it is a tree, then make sure that it is far from power lines or buildings.
* Water the plant immediately after planting and regularly thereafter to help it establish roots.
* Monitor the tree regularly and provide [proper care](https://amzn.to/3J9m1bd), including regular watering, pruning, and fertilizing, as needed.

fields.description: Challenge yourself to sprint 1 km in the least possible time.
fields.tips:
* Start with a warm-up by doing some light stretching, jumping jacks, or a quick walk to get your blood flowing and your muscles ready for exercise and after running, do some light stretching or a slow walk to cool down.
* Breathing is essential when running. Try to breathe in rhythm with your steps, taking deep breaths through your nose and exhaling through your mouth.
* It's important to drink water before, during, and after your run to keep your body hydrated. Make sure to have a bottle of water with you or plan your route near a water fountain.
* Good running form is essential to prevent injury and [improve performance](https://amzn.to/3YJH1uS). Make sure to keep your shoulders relaxed, your arms bent at a 90-degree angle, and your feet landing softly on the ground.

fields.description: Let your imagination run wild by reading a novel from any genre that captivates your mind and heart.
fields.tips:
* Choose a book that interests you or pick something from this [selection](https://amzn.to/3mAC1LK).
* As you read, try to visualize the characters, settings, and events in your mind. This will help bring the story to life and make it more engaging.
* Don't feel pressured to finish the book in a certain amount of time. Take your time and enjoy the journey.
* Talking about the book with friends, family, or book clubs can enhance your reading experience and deepen your understanding of the story.

fields.description: Put your drawing skills to the test and challenge yourself to create a realistic portrait of yourself.
fields.tips:
* Begin by drawing the basic shapes of your face, such as the outline of your head, the placement of your eyes, nose, and mouth. This will help you to build a [foundation](https://amzn.to/3LgfONx) for your drawing and ensure that your proportions are accurate.
* Drawing a portrait takes time and patience. Don't rush the process, take breaks when needed, and come back to it with fresh eyes.
* You can use pencils, charcoal, or even digital tools to create your portrait. Try [different](https://amzn.to/3JtItgB) materials and techniques until you find what works best for you.
* Don't get too caught up in drawing the portrait perfectly and remember to enjoy the process.

fields.description: Add a new adventure to your life's story by journeying to a new and uncharted place that will leave you with unforgettable memories.
fields.tips:
* Learn about the destination's culture, customs, history, climate, and local attractions to make the most of your trip.
* Decide what you want to see and do and create a rough itinerary.
* Take advantage of the opportunity to try new foods, participate in local activities, and immerse yourself in the culture.
* Plan for [expenses](https://amzn.to/400WtEc) ahead of time and stick to a budget to avoid overspending.

fields.description: Channel your inner crafter and challenge yourself to build something beautiful and functional by taking on a new DIY project.
fields.tips:
* Choose a project that is associated with some aspect of your life, [gather the materials](https://amzn.to/3Fg2DZ9) and make sure that you understand the instructions.
* Some interesting crafts you might enjoy: Macrame, Embroidery, Clay sculpting, Paper quilling, Candle making, Woodworking, Paint pouring, etc.
* Add your own personal touch to your project by using different colors, materials, or embellishments. This will make your project unique and special.
* Share your finished project with friends or family. This will give you a sense of pride and accomplishment, and may inspire others to try their own crafting or DIY project.

fields.description: Explore the boundless creativity of music by singing a song, letting your voice soar with the melodies and lyrics that inspire you.
fields.tips:
* Pick a song that you enjoy listening to and are familiar with. This will make the process of learning the song more enjoyable and less frustrating.
* Singing the song should be a fun and creative experience. Don't get too caught up in [singing](https://amzn.to/3ZGjfBs) the song perfectly and remember to enjoy the process.
* You can ask your friends or family to sing the song in a group. This will make for a far more enjoyable and fun experience.

fields.description: Discover new flavors and expand your culinary repertoire by cooking a unique recipe that you have never tried before.
fields.tips:
* Use online websites or ask recommendations from a friend and make sure that you know all the necessary steps. 
* Find out the ingredients from the recipe and make sure you get them all or you have the alternatives for missing ingredients. 
* Make sure that you have [necessary utensils](https://amzn.to/3ZVroBG). You can also use a timer or a measuring spoon to help you cook properly. 
* Experiment with the recipe according to your taste and maybe you will become an inventor of a new dish.

fields.description: Make a positive impact on someone's life by donating something or lending a helping hand to someone in need.
fields.tips:
* Treat the person with dignity and respect, and maintain their privacy and confidentiality.
* If you're unable to provide direct help, consider connecting the person with local organizations or resources that can provide additional support.
* Consider making a monetary donation or donating goods such as clothing or household items that you donâ€™t need anymore.
* Try to understand the individual's specific needs and what would be the most helpful for them.
